AAF.caption: images are uploaded
AAF.doc: This occurs when the images are finished uploading to Bubble & the element's state is updated with the uploaded_files URL's
AAF.name: images_are_uploaded

AAK.caption: Max number of files
AAK.doc: Choose the max number of files you want a user to select
AAK.name: max_number_of_files

AAE.caption: Uploaded FIles
AAE.doc: These are the files after they have been uploaded to Bubble AWS
AAE.name: uploaded_files

AAJ.caption: All Files
AAJ.doc: This is the list of files that is rendered instantly, from the users files. Upload these using the upload action.
AAJ.name: all_files
